Package com.irurueta.ar.sfm

Interface AbsoluteOrientationSlamTwoViewsSparseReconstructorListener

All Superinterfaces:
BaseSlamTwoViewsSparseReconstructorListener<AbsoluteOrientationSlamTwoViewsSparseReconstructor>, BaseTwoViewsSparseReconstructorListener<AbsoluteOrientationSlamTwoViewsSparseReconstructor>
public interface AbsoluteOrientationSlamTwoViewsSparseReconstructorListener extends BaseSlamTwoViewsSparseReconstructorListener<AbsoluteOrientationSlamTwoViewsSparseReconstructor>
Listener to retrieve and store required data to compute a 3D reconstruction from sparse image point correspondences in two views and using SLAM with absolute orientation for scale and orientation estimation.
